overview: This film will explore the reasons why the colourful and passionate Kahlo still captivates 65 years after her death. Featuring key moments from her life combined with a dramatized depiction of her vivid imagination, the film will depict Frida Kahloâ€™s life in a sensitive and celebratory way and give a concise, compelling and accurate representation of her development as an artist and a woman.
title: Frida Kahlo
